questions.question: In an SMIB system, the critical clearing time depends on which of the following factors?

answers.a: Generator inertia and critical rotor angle
answers.b: Transmission line impedance and load power
answers.c: Generator terminal voltage and excitation level

questions.question: In the equal area criterion, the 'accelerating area' represents:

answers.a: The energy lost by the generator rotor
answers.b: The electrical power output of the generator
answers.c: The mechanical power input to the generator
answers.d: The energy gained by the generator rotor

questions.question: A three-phase fault occurs on a transmission line. What happens to the generator rotor angle after the fault?
Which of the following factors improves transient stability in SMIB systems?
In an SMIB system, a fault is cleared by tripping a transmission line. What is the post-fault effect?

answers.a: The system returns immediately to pre-fault conditions
answers.b: The generator operates at a lower power transfer level
answers.c: The generator loses synchronism with the infinite bus
answers.d: The system voltage drops to zero
